Package com.nokia.maps.component.gesture

The gesture package offers a series of MapComponents which react to events generated by the Gesture API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ExtendedEventListener
    This interface defines a series of events for handling Gesture Events from the Gesture API.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GestureLongTouch
    This class defines a MapComponent which responds to the LONG PRESS gesture from the Gesture API.
    LongTouchComponent
    This class offers an abstract base class for long touch components which fire a Command if a Long Press has occurred, the class also remembers the location where the long press occurred.
    PinchZoomComponent
    The Pinch Zoom component responds to the PINCH gesture, and zooms the GestureMapCanvas in and out in response.
    TimerLongTouch
    This class defines a MapComponent which may be used as an alternative for responding to the LONG PRESS when the Gesture API is unavailable.

Package com.nokia.maps.component.gesture Description

The gesture package offers a series of MapComponents which react to events generated by the Gesture API.
